author: sky.cactus
content: This is a pretty common business strategy, to calculate the "average" operational cost incurred by your users and then kick out any customers who actually fully utilize your service.

author: sky.cactus
content: So you say "X GB/s" under the assumption that 99% of your users won't fully utilize that, and for the 1% who do you just terminate their accounts.
